snippet.title: Funtasia Furry Road - Demo release announcement trailer
snippet.description:
Download the demo on:
GameJolt _ https://gamejolt.com/games/funtasia/631720
Itch _ https://fantasticostudio.itch.io/funtasia
Indiexpo _ https://www.indiexpo.net/it/games/funtasia-furry-road

Wishlist the game on STEAM:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1795010/Funtasia__Furry_Road/
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Funtasia is a 2D car game where furry animals in crazy vehicles have to clean their planet by defeating terrible garbage monsters. Tons of tracks awaiting you. Play alone or with your friends to get to the finish, or challenge them in ridiculous speed races.
